name: Feathers, Fur, and Fury
description:
Made for ld46.

WASD =  move

SPACE = fire

Made for Ludum Dare 46: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/feathers-fur-and-fury

Thank you to all of the asset creators who provided assets used in this game:

- Tiles: https://snifferdragon.itch.io/endery-tileset

- Characters: https://jfaexe.itch.io/nt-like-sprites-pack

- Grocery Store Stuff: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/food
